packageRules.description: replace deprecated go1.x lambda with provided.al2

customManagers.description: Updates aws lambda Versions in custom platform appspec

transformTemplates: { "releases": $filter($,function($v) { $contains($v.cycle,{{packageName}}) }).{ "version": latest != '' ? latest : cycle, "releaseTimestamp": $toMillis(releaseDate) ~> $fromMillis(), "isDeprecated": eol = false ? false : $toMillis(eol) <= $toMillis($now()), "changeLogUrl": link, "sourceUrl": link }, "homepage": "https://endoflife.date" }
